title: Looking for Planetary Science Expert
description: We are looking for qualified people with a background in science and ideally planatery formation.  Must be able to take orders and be comfortable around a startship.

title: Looking for temp work?
description: Do you like to travel to far off places?  Have adventure and work with driven smart, loyal people?  Then this is the position for you.  You must be a fast learner and willing to die.

title: Hate the Empire, click here
description: We hate the Empire too, but we also are doing something about it.  We are looking for all types of people to come join the fight.  Don't worrie you don't have to be a Jedi to help.
